item.title: Notes on the Contact book app, pt. 2
Notes on the Contact book app, pt. 1
item.description: Please mind that this project was made to gain a better grasp on Django. The code may have weak points and shouldn’t be used in production. Not so long ago I started building an InteractiveContacts project using Django and native JS. Why this tech stack? Django is the go-to framework thanks to its out-of-the-box features. Native JS allows one to build things from scratch - I decided to go the hard way and didn’t use front-end frameworks.
